Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 169th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Edson Botella (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2015, off Carlos Valderrama (CIN)...
Injured on 7/9/2015 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/12/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $7,880,001 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Atlanta on 4/3/2016...
Injured on 6/22/2016 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2016...
Injured on 4/9/2017 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/2018 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/12/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $2,890,000 per year...
Injured on 4/23/2019 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
